Bash(git -C "C:\\Repositories for Git\\career-search" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''

- Merged old Phase 3 + project scoping into Phase 2 \(May-Jul\): build + ship project 2
- Renumbered Phases 4-6 to 3-5
- Added emojis to all phase headings and day-of-week headings
- Changed LeetCode/DSA references to HackerRank/LeetCode/DSA throughout
- Added SQL practice, 2x/week posting, open source, mock interviews
- Converted day-of-week headings to h4, demoted pre-phase sections to h3
EOF
\)")
